reviewText: What a great find. People who truly love Phyllis Hyman's music you will love this movie. She is quite a hand full in this movie. I'm so glad I found it on Amazon. The movie is on the hard to find list just like some of her appearance in other movies.
I only bought this VHS because Phyllis Hyman is in the movie.  Don't get it confused, though; Those 5 stars go to Phyllis, and not the movie...lol.  She did a good acting job to me.
